techmeme.title: Source: Baidu plans to unveil smart glasses with built-in cameras and voice support for AI model Ernie next week, launching as soon as early 2025 for under $299 (Bloomberg)
Block says it is investing less in music streaming app Tidal and winding down decentralized "Web5" venture TBD to focus on bitcoin mining and its crypto wallet (Aoyon Ashraf/CoinDesk)
A US judge dismisses a copyright lawsuit by Raw Story and AlterNet against OpenAI over AI training, for now, saying the outlets couldn't show enough harm (Blake Brittain/Reuters)
Source: Amazon is discussing a second multibillion-dollar investment in Anthropic, but wants Anthropic to use a large number of servers powered by Amazon chips (Anissa Gardizy/The Information)
TikTok launches Share to TikTok, which lets users directly share music from Apple Music and Spotify in a post to their TikTok Feed or in DMs via TikTok Messages (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
